org.interpss.numeric.matrix

Class AbstractMatrixEqn<TMatrix,TVector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.interpss.numeric.matrix.AbstractMatrixEqn<TMatrix,TVector>
  • Type Parameters:
    TMatrix - template for matrix [A] element
    TVector - template for vector [b] element
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComplexMatrixEqn

    public class AbstractMatrixEqn<TMatrix,TVector>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for defining a full matrix eqn [A][x] = [b]
